item.title: Famitsu Sales: 5/26/25 – 6/1/25
item.content:encoded:

Elden Ring Nightreign debuts at 51,263 retail sales.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the two weeks spanning May 26, 2025 to June 1, 2025.

Elden Ring Nightreign was the highest selling new release last week, debuting at 42,758 units on PlayStation 5 and 6,212 units on PlayStation 4 for an opening week total of 51,263 retail copies sold.

On the hardware side, the Switch family sold 20,075 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 15,266 units, the Xbox Series family sold 262 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 27 units.

Get the full sales charts below.
